text:
SUrO# vA pRuqthsu kAsu# cit | 
dEqvAnAqM ~Mya inmanOq yaja#mAnaq iya#kShatyaqBIdaya#jvanO Buvat || 
na ya#jamAna riShyasiq na su#nvAnaq na dE#vayO || 
asaqdatra# suqvIrya#muqta tyadAqSvaSvi#yaM || 
nakiqShTaM karma#NA naSaqnna prayO#Shaqnna yO#Shati || 
upa# kSharantiq sindha#vO mayOqBuva# IjAqnaM ca# yaqkShyamA#NaM ca dhEqnava#H | 
pRuqNanta#M caq papu#riM ca - [  ] 41
